Hello Implementers,
Hapi jpa R4 release inside a bundle txn, conditional patch is not working. Can you please kindly suggest a workaround ?. One possible solution I am thinking is that instead of patch, read the resource again, apply the changed fields on the read resource, apply bundle PUT with setIfMatch (conditional version). Is this ok ofcourse this has a penalty of reading the resource. Are there any other alternatives ?. Can you please kindly suggest. thanks for your kind help.
@James Agnew? (Also @Nath, HAPI questions are best directed to #hapi
thanks @Lloyd McKenzie . I am not sure how to move this to #hapi. In future will do.apologies.

You can't move it - but you can re-raise it there. (Raising an issue on a different stream is ok if someone's told you to do it. We just prefer for questions not to be raised in multiple places unless you've been directed to do so.)
thanks @Lloyd McKenzie . I will raise it in #hapi.
